name: Forgiveness - DEMO
description:
Thank you for checking out our page!
This game contains a lot of hard puzzles to test you and your abilities!

"Forgiveness™" is a first-person puzzle psychological horror escape room game, based on the seven deadly sins.

The game begins with you taking a personality test to decide what is your sin at the start of the game

afterward, you will be greeted to the prolog so you can get the hang of the game and hear the story, once finishing the prolog puzzle you will be taken to your sin room.

at the moment the demo contains only the prolog.
The prolog is very short and its just so you can get the hang of the game.
the full game contains 7 different rooms with a lot of hard puzzles to solve!.

We are hoping to publish our game to Steam for all future releases.
But we will continue to post updates and logs here on itch.io for you to follow and stay up to date with our progress!

The game focus is on puzzles, even though it counts as a psychological horror, this game DO NOT contains jumpscares!
